channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge rules USPS ban on guns is unconstitutional
item.description: The U.S. Postal Service policy banning people from bringing firearms into post offices violates the Constitution, a federal judge in Texas ruled Tuesd...

item.title: Pope intervenes in U.S. abortion debate by raising what it really means to be pro-life
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has intervened for the first time in an abortion dispute roiling the U.S. Catholic Church, raising the seeming contradiction over what it...

item.title: Wall Street takes sour view of government shutdown, economic data blackout
item.description: U.S. stocks fell on Wednesday as investors feared a prolonged government shutdown would harm the economy -- and key data on its health.

item.title: Appeals court vacates ruling that struck down Trump's Alien Enemies Act deportations
item.description: A federal appeals court has vacated its previous ruling against President Trump's attempt to deport members of the Tren de Aragua gang under the Alien...

item.title: White House pulls nomination of E.J. Antoni to lead Bureau of Labor Statistics
item.description: The White House late Tuesday withdrew the nomination of E. J. Antoni to serve as the next commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: President Trump Emphasizes Border Security in United Nations Address
item.description: In his first United Nations address of his second term, President Donald Trump emphasized the dangers of open-borders policies and called UN member st...

item.title: What DNC Chair Ken Martin Didn’t Say about the Dallas Attack is More Significant than What He Did Say
item.description: The chairman of the Democratic National Committee properly condemned this week’s deadly attack on an ICE facility and the general escalation of politi...

item.title: Jasmine Crockett Slanders ICE While Downplaying and Lying About Illegal Alien Crime
item.description: Squad member Jasmine Crockett is at it again, making outrageous and slanderous claims about ICE serving as “slave patrols” and ignoring the data by do...

item.title: ICE is Increasingly Taking the “Sanctuary” out of Sanctuary Jurisdictions
item.description: Illegal aliens may want to rethink whether living in sanctuary jurisdictions is still a bright idea. After all, with enhanced federal immigration enfo...

item.title: They Never Learn: Chicagoland Sanctuary Politicians Continue to Sabotage the Rule of Law
item.description: As ICE steps up enforcement in Chicago and its suburbs, sanctuary politicians are once again attempting to sabotage the rule of law and protect illega...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
